name: Streamline Icons
desc: With 12 different styles and impressive choice of themes, you will always find the right icon for your projects. All built from scratch by our team, searchable through our app or plugin for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD.

name: Simple Icons
desc: 2000+ Free SVG icons for popular brands

name: Avatar Library
desc: DiceBear is an avatar library for designers and developers.You can choose between simple identity icons and lovely designed characters.And best of all, It will provide a simple and free HTTP API that you can use right away!

name: App Icon Generator
desc: Generate icons and image sets with different resolutions for your mobile apps
